description: The Jager EVO Low GTX is a mid height, rugged boot with a full-grain leather upper designed for intensive use in damp and cold areas. The perfect boot for hunting and forestry work the Jager Low GTX features a waterproof and breathable Gore- Tex® membrane lining and rugged Vibram sole. Put on the Jager Low GTX for instant comfort thanks to the ultra-light micro-porous midsole that will help you stay on your feet longer and fatigue less. Hand made in our Montebelluna, Italy headquarters.
name: Aku Jager Evo Low GTX - Mens
